resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec convallis id dolor non pulvinar. Vestibulum nec eleifend magna, vitae dictum risus. string-array.name: bottles_of_beer
string-array.item: %1$d bottles of beer on the wall
Take one down and pass it around
%1$d bottles of beer on the wall.

string-array.name: monkeys_on_the_bed
string-array.item: %1$d little monkeys jumping on the bed
One fell off and bumped his head
Mama called the doctor and the doctor said
No more monkeys jumping on the bed

string-array.name: little_ducks
string-array.item: %1$d little ducks went swimming one day
Over the hill and far away
Mother duck said, "Quack, quack, quack, quack."
But only %1$d little ducks came back.
